definition: a goose's footprint in the snow/vestiges of the past (idiom)/the fleeting nature of human life (idiom)
snow/snowfall/CL:場|场[chang2]/to have the appearance of snow/to wipe away, off or out/to clean

foot of a bird or animal/paw/claws/talons
